ineligible_applicants.reason: No verifiable financial evidence (bank/M-PESA statement, income statement, etc.) was submitted for verification.
The entity is registered as a 'Self-Help Group', which is not a legally recognized cluster entity (MSME association, cooperative, or company) for this program.
The primary value chain is 'Retail & Trade', which is not a designated priority value chain (Dairy, Textiles, Edible Oils, Construction) or additional BETA value chain.
The application's focus is on **primary farming** (Edible Oils), which is explicitly excluded from the KJET priority as the program targets value-addition, processing, or manufacturing nodes.
The application's focus is on **primary production/farming** (Aquaculture/Fingerlings), which is outside the scope of the Blue Economy priority for value-addition, processing, or manufacturing nodes.
The entity is registered as a 'Sole Proprietorship'/'Other', which is not a legally recognized cluster entity (MSME association, cooperative, or company) for this program.
